MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML6 postcode area of Plains. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:09pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:50 PM on Friday, 25 December 2020.
